lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Joining the Chamber of Commerce

sentence.idiomatic: I need to go to the American Chamber of Commerce to deal with something.
The chamber of commerce has helped us a lot.
He works at the chamber of commerce.
If it weren’t for their support, I would not have succeeded.
Thank you, everyone, for your support.
You can do what you think is best, we all will support you.
Only members can enter.
Are you a member here?
All our members can enjoy a 20% discount.
The activity they organized was very successful.
The school has recently organized a trip to Suzhou for everyone.
The company hasn’t organized an activity in a long time.
Our company will conduct regular training for employees.
New employees must attend training.
I can’t attend today’s training.
Since you put it that way, we belong to the same profession.
He has been in the architectural profession for twenty years already.
These are all the latest hot professions.
Her interpersonal relationships are simple.
This training will tell us about some problems that may arise in our interpersonal associations.
He has been teaching human communications in university for many years.
Nowadays many young people indulge in internet games.
In recent years, internet education has become very popular.
There is something wrong with the company’s network today.
Our new products need to be promoted in the market.
The product promotion plan you proposed is very good.
Some companies like to promote their products on the internet.
How long have you been in China? Do you like it here?
A few months now. There are a lot of opportunities here. From a businessman’s point of view, it is a really good place. Hey, are there a lot of foreign chambers of commerce here?

There sure are! In the bigger cities, the major countries of the world all have their own chambers of commerce, for example: the American Chamber of Commerce, the European Chamber of Commerce, the Australian Chamber of Commerce, etc. They all have a lot of impact.
So, what benefits are there to join a Chamber of Commerce?

There are so many benefits! They support their members’ work in different ways. They regularly organize training and meetings. They also introduce members of the same and different professions, establishing excellent networks of people.
That is so important for people who have just arrived in China! It can not only help us promote our business, but we can also make a lot of friends.

Exactly. Both for work and in everyday life the chamber of commerce has always been a big help to me. Furthermore, they also inform us about a lot of the laws in China, as well as the things you need to pay attention to when doing business here.
That’s really so great. I must go and join immediately!
